adv: It shows more options that I wouldn't think of. It helps when I don't have a clear path towards completing my task.
disadv:
I have to spend time trying to understand many non-obvious visualizations that are not helpful. 
Also, some of the visualization techniques seem confusing to me.
comment: It would be a good addition to an existing data exploration or data analytics tool. Trying to answer questions using only the recommendation tool combined with a very limited data exploration tool was pretty painful.
